err_no_drive: No drives detected. Please ensure at least one drive is connected and accessible and refresh the view.
warn_no_partition:
You have only one disk partition.
Add at least one more disk partition or add an additional storage device to your PC in order to continue.
info_same_partition:
One or more backups have the source and destination in the same partition.
Modify the backups so that they use different partitions to avoid potential conflicts and problems.
info_removable_drive: Removing this, currently selected, drive during an ongoing backup process might interrupt file transfers, cause errors, or result in data corruption.

rs.err_no_drive: Nema detektovanih drajvova. Molimo vas da osigurate da je barem jedan drajv povezan i dostupan, pa zatim osvežite prikaz.
rs.warn_no_partition:
Imate samo jednu disk particiju.
Dodajte barem još jednu particiju ili dodajte dodatni uređaj za skladištenje na vašem računaru kako biste nastavili.
rs.info_same_partition:
Jedan ili više bekapova imaju izvor i odredište na istoj particiji.
Izmenite bekapove tako da koriste različite particije kako biste izbegli potencijalne konflikte i probleme.
rs.info_removable_drive: Uklanjanje ovog drajva tokom procesa bekapovanja može prekinuti prenose fajlova, izazvati greške ili dovesti do korupcije podataka.
